usage.cn: 不要为过往而哭泣，过去的让它都过去吧。不要幻想未来，未来虚无缥缈。活在当下，活得漂亮！
usage.eng: Don't cry over the past, it's gone. Don't stress about the future, it hasn't arrived. Live in the present and make it beautiful.

usage.cn: 的确只有当我们失去时才知道曾拥有的是什么，同样，只有当我们拥有了才知道曾经失去了什么。
usage.eng: It's true that we don't know what we've got until we lose it, but it's also true that we don't know what we've been losing until it arrives.
